question: The Rewari-Madar section, which was recently inaugurated, is a part of which Industrial corridor?
explanation:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi recently inaugurated Rewari-Madar section, which is a part of the Western Dedicated Freight Corridor.
The Rewari-Madar section is situated in Haryana and Rajasthan. It consists of nine newly-built Dedicated Freight Corridor stations. With this launch, several industries in the region will enjoy seamless connectivity.
